description: This file defines a React functional component named ExecutionControls, which provides a UI for triggering job execution and generation actions. It manages user interactions, state updates, and API calls to trigger backend processes for a specific job identified by jobId.

methods.name: ExecutionControls({ jobId })
methods.description: React functional component that renders UI controls for executing or generating a job, managing local state for busy status and messages, and handling button clicks to trigger API calls.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Asynchronous function that triggers either generation or execution for the specified job ID, updating the UI with success/failure messages.
